message:
Hefajot Islam ISLAM namtake kolonkito korar chesta kortese.Kenore vai shantiprio Bangaligulor dhormio mullobodh niye nijeder sarther khela khelchis..Janish na sobaike ekdin morte hobe.ki jobab dibi ALLAH ke , orajokota kortechish tao abar ALLAH ROSUL ke jorie.....He ALLAH amaderke khoma koro,sothik poth dekhao,please...AMEEN.
FAN POST.
